title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ‚Çπ6\\-9 LPA
 



 Experience: 0 ‚Äì 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours ‚Äî eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We‚Äôre a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We‚Äôre looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You‚Äôll work on real problems ‚Äî from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines ‚Äî while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You‚Äôll Need:
 



 \\-0‚Äì3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.
 



 \\-Collaborate with passionate builders and problem\\-solvers who are transforming hiring.
 



  





 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to meet you.

title: Web Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Indian Anime Club (IAC) is a community\\-driven platform created by fans, for fans, celebrating the vibrant world of anime. Dedicated to bringing Indian anime enthusiasts together, IAC offers resources such as reviews, character bios, and discussions on trending shows and manga. Combining a love for Japanese animation with the spirit of the Indian community, our mission is to build the largest digital anime family in India. At IAC, fans have a space to connect, share their passion, and immerse themselves in the unique culture of anime.
 



  





**Apply on the careers page for faster screening** 




 üëâhttps://indiananimeclub.com/careers\\-at\\-indian\\-anime\\-club/
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time hybrid role for a Web Developer. The position is based in Bengaluru with flexibility for some work\\-from\\-home days. The Web Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing the IAC website to enhance user experience. Responsibilities include front\\-end development, back\\-end integration, and ensuring seamless performance across all devices and platforms. The candidate will work in collaboration with cross\\-functional teams to drive website improvements and new features.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proficiency in Front\\-End Development and Web Design, with a strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Experience in Back\\-End Web Development, including server\\-side programming and database management
* Solid understanding of core concepts in Programming and Web Development
* Ability to create user\\-friendly, visually appealing, and responsive web designs
* Experience with frameworks and libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js is a plus
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot and debug complex issues
* A passion for anime and familiarity with anime culture is an added bonus
* Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field, or equivalent relevant experience

title: Intern PHP
description:
**Company Description**

 PPStack is a global EdTech brand revolutionizing education by integrating artificial intelligence, innovative technology, and cutting\\-edge teaching methodologies. Our mission is to bridge the gap between education and industry by equipping individuals with future\\-ready skills for career growth and digital empowerment. Catering to students, professionals, and organizations worldwide, PPStack offers AI\\-powered learning platforms, career coaching, corporate training, and technology consulting. We are dedicated to fueling innovation, fostering career transformation, and creating a smarter future through education.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote Intern PHP role at PPStack. The intern will work on developing, debugging, and optimizing PHP\\-based applications, writing clean and efficient code, and collaborating with the development team to integrate user\\-facing elements with server\\-side functionalities. Other responsibilities include troubleshooting application issues, contributing to technical documentation, and participating in code reviews while learning industry best practices.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in PHP, MySQL, and familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Understanding of RESTful APIs and experience with integrating backend services
* Knowledge of PHP frameworks such as Laravel or CodeIgniter is a plus
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and ability to debug and optimize code
* Familiarity with version control systems like Git
* Good communication, teamwork skills, and eagerness to learn in a collaborative environment
* Basic knowledge of database design principles and query optimization
* Pursuing or recently graduated with a degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field

 of ‚Çπ20 LPA with performance\\-based bonuses

title: Software Architech (Unpaid till funding)
description:
**Company Description**
  

 At Nexlance, we focus on connecting people, ideas, and solutions to empower businesses. By providing services such as talent acquisition, workplace tools, background checks, and corporate social responsibility support, we simplify and enhance work experiences. Our goal is to create more efficient and human\\-centered workplaces that drive growth.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time, remote role for a Software Architect at Nexlance. The Software Architect will be responsible for designing and leading software development projects, creating scalable and robust architecture, and ensuring high performance and security. As this is an unpaid position until funding, the selected candidate will work closely with the founding team to build and implement technology solutions that align with the company's mission.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong skills in Software Development and Programming
* Expertise in Databases and Data Management
* Proficiency in Software Design and Architecture
* Experience in Software Testing and Quality Assurance
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to think strategically
* Familiarity with cloud computing and distributed systems is a plus
* Bachelor‚Äôs/Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities in remote work settings

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
Adler is a Korean tech startup building the "Virtual Random Chat" on the web. We have raised $5M from over 100 investors, including Kakao and a HYBE (Home of BTS) director.
 



  





**üîó Product Link: https://adler3d.com** 




  





 \\- Avatar \\& Room: You don't show your face. You express yourself through your 3D character and your own customized room.
 



 \\- No Install Required: Our proprietary 3D engine allows users to access a high\\-quality 3D world instantly via a web link.
 



 \\- The Vision: We are building a "Virtual Nation" where anyone can express their true self and find genuine connections.
 



  





**‚ö†Ô∏è WARNING: Read This Before You Apply** 




  





 1\\. We are Financially Broke: We are in a severe financial crisis. We are cash\\-poor. Even the team is mainly working unpaid to survive.
 



 2\\. The Product is a Mess: Our product currently sucks. It crashes. It's frustrating. It is far from perfect.
 



 3\\. The Pay is Low: We can't pay you a fancy salary right now.
 



  





**‚ÄºÔ∏è However, this could be an opportunity** 




  





 1\\. Take the Wealth: Help us hit $1M Revenue and $10M Investment in 2026\\. If we win, we will flood you with massive compensation.
 



 2\\. Fix the Mess: Our product/marketing is shit right now. You have infinite opportunities to fix it and become a hero.
 



 3\\. Crazy Metrics: Our product metrics are exploding. In just 4 weeks, we grew 1,805% (19x).
 



 \\- Nov 15 \\- Nov 21: 2,399 matches
 



 \\- Dec 13 \\- Dec 19: 45,704 matches
 



  





**üíé Adler‚Äôs Crazy HR Philosophy** 




  





 1\\. "All\\-In" Pro\\-Gamer Mindset Only hire the hungry, the desperate, and the obsessed who dedicate their life to winning the game.
 



 2\\. Equal Pay for Equal Performance Refuse to discriminate based on location; compensation is determined 100% by value, never by a passport.
 



 3\\. Exponential Rewards (Rank System) Compensation is based on a Rank System (Bronze to Grandmaster); pay skyrockets based on impact, ranging from unpaid to Silicon Valley levels.
 



 4\\. Radical Meritocracy Ignore degree, age, nationality, or use of AI; care about only one thing: "Can you create actual KPI?"
 



 5\\. Quarterly Re\\-evaluation Rank is re\\-evaluated every 3 months. Salary and position can increase, decrease, or end (fire) based on quarterly performance.
 



  





**üìå Position Details** 




  





 ‚Ä¢ Job Title: Software Engineer Intern
 



 ‚Ä¢ Employment type: Full\\-time, Remote
 



 ‚Ä¢ Starting Salary: $0 \\~ $300 USD / month
 



 ‚Ä¢ Location: Everywhere
 



 ‚Ä¢ AI tools can be provided
 



  





 üéØ
 **Responsibilities** 




  





 1\\. Rapid Prototyping (Ship in Hours): Don't over\\-engineer. We need features TODAY. Build dirty, fast prototypes to test ideas instantly.
 



 2\\. Visual Bridge (Dev \\<\\-\\> Design): You are the bridge. Build interactive 3D demos to help the Product \\& Design teams visualize their ideas instantly. Your prototype answers the question: "Is this fun?"
 



 3\\. "Throwaway" Code: Your code is for validation, not production. Don't worry about clean architecture. The core Dev team will re\\-develop it properly later. Your job is to make it work on\\-screen NOW.
 



 4\\. Master Three.js (No Excuses): You will use Three.js daily. If you don't know it, you must learn it while you work. You cannot avoid it; you must manipulate meshes and textures to prove concepts.
 



 5\\. Aggressive AI Leverage: Don't write boilerplate manually. Use ChatGPT, Claude, or Copilot to write 80% of the code. We judge you by speed, not by how hard you type.
 



  





**‚úÖ Requirements** 




  





 1\\. JS/TS \\& React (Three.js Will): You must be proficient in JavaScript or TypeScript and React. While expert\\-level Three.js is not required to start, you must have the relentless will to learn it. You are expected to ship 3D prototypes from Day 1\\.
 



 2\\. High Communication Skills: This is not a solo coding job. You must be able to discuss abstract concepts (UI flow, 3D logic, user experience) with Designers and Product Owners in English. If you cannot explain your logic clearly, you cannot work here.
 



 3\\. Extreme Learning Curve: You must be confident you can grasp the basics of 3D web development in 3 days using AI and documentation. "I don't know how" is not an excuse.
 



 4\\. "War\\-Time" Hunger: We need people who are desperate to prove their coding skills and grow.
 



 5\\. Autonomy: 100% self\\-managed. We measure prototypes shipped, not hours.
 



 6\\. Basic Infrastructure: You need a laptop that can handle 3D development and a stable internet connection.
 



  





**üåü Preferred** 




  





 1\\. Heavy Gamer / Social Media Addict: You spend hours on Games (Roblox, VRChat, LoL) or Social Media (TikTok, Discord). You understand what makes a digital interface "addictive."
 



 2\\. Digital Native Socializer: You have experience making real friends online (without meeting them in person). You understand the "Adler Vision" intuitively because you have lived it.
 



 3\\. Speed Demon: You value "Running Code" over "Clean Code." You prefer shipping a working prototype today over a perfect architecture next week.
 



 4\\. Design\\-Centric Developer: You understand what "UX" means. You don't just code logic; you care about how it
 *feels* 
 to the user.
 



 5\\. AI Freak: You use AI coding assistants for everything. You are lazy, so you automate your coding workflow.
 



 6\\. Detachment: You don't fall in love with your code. You are okay with your code being deleted and rewritten by the core team after validation.
 



 7\\. Chaos Survivor: Early\\-stage startup experience. You don't panic when the requirements change 5 times a day.
 



 8\\. Game Dev Spirit: You have experience with Unity/Unreal or web game development. You understand the "Game Loop."
 



 9\\. Thick Skin: You love harsh feedback from Designers. You don't cry when they say "change this"; you just change it.
 



 10\\. Pro\\-Active "Nagger": You are not afraid to annoy the CEO or Designers to get clarity on a feature.
 



  





**üì© How to Apply** 




  





 To apply for this position, please complete our official application form here: https://forms.gle/dtWVyyLyW74srUsY6
 


* (Please note: A Google account is required to upload files and complete your submission.)
